programme.title: US import restrictions, March 1975
programme.short_synopsis: US import restrictions. Possible trade with Cuba.
programme.medium_synopsis: US import restrictions. Possible trade with Cuba. No support for Cambodia.
programme.long_synopsis:
US import restrictions. Possible trade with Cuba. No support for Cambodia.

The sound quality on this recording is variable/poor.

This archive edition of Letter from America was recorded by one of two listeners, who between them taped and labelled over 650 Letter From America programmes from 1973 to 1989. It was restored by the BBC in 2014.
